Service Details: - Supports young people and their families in dealing with the provincial child and youth welfare system- Provides oversight to this system and makes recommendations to improve it- Responsible for working with other public bodies towards informing improvements to services to help prevent injuries or deaths in the future- Committed to ensuring that the rights and interests of children and youth are protected and upheld, and that their views are heard and considered by decision-makers
